name: Forefront Medical Technology
overview: Forefront is an integrated medical device contract manufacturer that provides collaborative product design and development, rapid SLS prototyping, tool making, injection moulding and extrusion, clean room scalable assembly and packaging, testing, sterilisation and global logistics. Customers select the specific contract manufacturing resources they need, or Forefront has the expertise to custom design a new product from a conceptual drawing into a completely manufactured, packaged and sterilised product, ready for global shipment. Their integrated capabilities bring customersâ€™ new products to market quickly, while providing confidentiality of new designs and protection of intellectual property.

milestones.description: Hydromer, Inc. Sells Medical OEM Business to Forefront Medical
